sense.name: elaboration
sense.commentary: enlargement - a discussion that provides additional information
sense.examples: The third paragraph of my paper is the expansion of my argument.

sense.name: expanding upon
sense.examples: The new info required an expansion of her file. The expansion of the dictionary took several months.

sense.name: increasing
sense.commentary: EXPANSION[+event] the act of increasing something in size, volume, quantity, or scope
sense.examples: The expansion of the house took a whole year. The expansion of the company didn't go well.

sense.name: the addition
sense.examples: The expansion of the house was done in all blue.
